languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, его план — агония зажатого в угол смертника, хватающегося за воображаемые соломинки. Когда-то Вакемо был умен, расчетлив и изворотлив, но сейчас он уже проиграл и просто отказывается это признавать. Не нам, скромным дельцам, покушаться на Вольного Торговца. Другое дело, если бы у нас была сильная мотивация или Вольный Торговец в союзниках..." {n}Ризза красноречиво смотрит прямо вам в глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}, не сочтите за грубость, но его план — агония зажатого в угол смертника, хватающегося за воображаемые соломинки. Владайм умен, рассчетлив и изворотлив, но он уже проиграл — он просто отказывается это признавать. Я с ним на дно идти не собираюсь, и вам не советую".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, его план — агония зажатого в угол смертника, хватающегося за воображаемые соломинки. Когда-то Вакемо был умен, расчетлив и изворотлив, но сейчас он уже проиграл и просто отказывается это признавать. Не нам, скромным дельцам, покушаться на Вольного Торговца. Другое дело, если бы у нас была сильная мотивация или Вольный Торговец в союзниках..." {n}Ризза красноречиво смотрит прямо вам в глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his plan is the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Wackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

languages.text: “大人，他已经被逼到了绝路。他所谓的什么计划，不过是破釜沉舟罢了。弗拉魔以前是个聪明人，精明、狡猾，可现在，他只是不想承认自己输了而已。我们这些不值一提的小贩子，根本就不是行商浪人的对手。当然，如果我们这场仗非打不可，或者我们这边也有行商浪人，那情况可就不一样了……”{n}莱萨直视着你的目光，她的意思非常明确。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，他已经被逼到了绝路，他不过是拼死一搏罢了。弗拉魔以前是个聪明人，精明、狡猾，可现在，他只是不想承认自己输了而已。我们这些不值一提的小贩子，根本就不是行商浪人的队友。当然，如果我们这场仗非打不可，或者我们这边也有行商浪人，那情况可就不一样了……”{n}莱萨直视着你的目光，她的意思非常明确。{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下。彼のいわゆる計画は、追い詰められた死刑囚が想像上の藁にも縋る思いで、もがき苦しんでいる様でしかありません。かつてヴァケモは賢く、抜け目がなく、狡猾でしたが、今はただ負けを認めたくないだけです。私達のような平凡な商人は自由開拓者にはかないません。もちろん、私達に強い動機があったり自由開拓者の味方がいれば話が違いますが…」{n}ライツァはあなたの目を真っすぐ見て、意思をハッキリと伝えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下。彼の計画はまるで、追い詰められた死刑囚が藁にも縋る思いで、もがき苦しんでいる様です。かつてヴァケモは賢く、抜け目がなく、狡猾でしたが、今はただ負けを認めたくないだけです。私達のような平凡な商人は自由開拓者にはかないません。もちろん、私達に強い動機があったり自由開拓者の味方がいれば話が違いますが…」{n}ライツァはあなたの目を真っすぐ見て、意思をハッキリと伝えた。{/n}

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, su mal llamado plan no es más que la agonía de un hombre acorralado y condenado que se agarra a un clavo ardiendo. El Vackemo solía ser inteligente y astuto, pero ahora se niega a admitir que ya ha perdido. Nosotros, los comerciantes modestos, no somos rivales para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. Sería distinto si encontráramos la motivación o tuviéramos a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente de nuestro lado...». {n}Ryzza te mira directamente a los ojos. Sus intenciones son claras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, su plan es la agonía de un hombre acorralado y condenado que se agarra a un clavo ardiendo. El Vackemo solía ser inteligente y astuto, pero ahora se niega a admitir que ya ha perdido. Nosotros, los comerciantes modestos, no somos rivales para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. Sería distinto si encontráramos la motivación o tuviéramos a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente de nuestro lado...». {n}Ryzza te mira directamente a los ojos. Sus intenciones son claras.{/n}

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, sein so genannter Plan ist nichts weiter als der Todeskampf eines in die Enge getriebenen und verdammten Mannes, der sich an imaginäre Strohhalme klammert. Der Vackemo war einmal klug, gerissen und listig, doch jetzt weigert er sich einfach nur einzugestehen, dass er längst verloren hat. Wir bescheidenen Kaufleute können einem Freihändler nichts entgegensetzen. Es wäre natürlich anders, wenn wir eine starke Motivation oder einen Freihändler auf unserer Seite hätten ..." {n}Ryzza blickt dir direkt in die Augen. Es ist ganz klar, was sie meint.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, sein Plan ist der Todeskampf eines in die Enge getriebenen und verdammten Mannes, der sich an imaginäre Strohhalme klammert. Der Vackemo war einmal klug, gerissen und listig, doch jetzt weigert er sich einfach nur einzugestehen, dass er längst verloren hat. Wir bescheidenen Kaufleute können einem Freihändler nichts entgegensetzen. Es wäre natürlich anders, wenn wir eine starke Motivation oder einen Freihändler auf unserer Seite hätten ..." {n}Ryzza blickt dir direkt in die Augen. Es ist ganz klar, was sie meint.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, son plan n'est que la vaine tentative d'un homme acculé et condamné qui se raccroche à des espoirs imaginaires. Le Vackemo était intelligent et astucieux autrefois, mais maintenant, il refuse simplement d'admettre qu'il a perdu la partie. Les petits trafiquants comme nous ne sont pas de taille face à une libre-marchande. Bien sûr, ce serait différent si nous étions très motivés ou si nous avions {mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande} avec nous... » {n}Ryzza vous fixe d'un regard sans équivoque.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, his so-called plan is nothing but the death throes of a cornered and condemned man who's grasping at imaginary straws. The Vackemo was once smart, shrewd, and wily, but now he's simply refusing to admit he's already lost. We modest dealers are no match for a Rogue Trader. It would be different, of course, if we were strongly motivated or had a Rogue Trader on our side..." {n}Ryzza looks you straight in the eye, her meaning quite clear.{/n}

Bien sûr, ce serait différent si nous étions très motivés ou si nous avions {mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande} avec nous... » {n}Ryzza vous fixe d'un regard sans équivoque.{/n}
